snippet.title: "Plop, Fizz, Boom!" trailer
snippet.description:
The game, "Plop, Fizz Boom!" offers a cartoonish remake of the 1977 arcade classic, "Depthcharge", with noticeable embellishments include the superseding of the player's original charge with an innocuous-looking sailboat, armed with an inexhaustible supply of TNT.  Meanwhile, enemies materialize in an elaborate variety of forms, with unique performance and attack characteristics.

The game can currently be purchased from Desura for the cost of $2.99 (USD). 

http://www.desura.com/games/plop-fizz-boom
